## draw

- If the values should be centered and scaled in either the row direction or the column direction, or none. Corresponding values are "row", "column" and "none".

  <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jinhuili-lab/personal_image_bed/master/img99202201112146100.png" style="zoom:33%;" /><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jinhuili-lab/personal_image_bed/master/img99202201112146143.png" style="zoom:33%;" /><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jinhuili-lab/personal_image_bed/master/img99202201112146195.png" style="zoom:33%;" />

- The agglomeration method to be used. This should be (an unambiguous abbreviation of) one of "ward.D", "ward.D2", "single", "complete", "average" (= UPGMA), "mcquitty" (= WPGMA), "median" (= WPGMC) or "centroid" (= UPGMC).<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jinhuili-lab/personal_image_bed/master/img99202201112146237.png" style="zoom:33%;" /><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jinhuili-lab/personal_image_bed/master/img99202201112146272.png" style="zoom:33%;" />
